flights.title: Hawaiii
flights.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

flights.title: China
flights.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

flights.title: NewYork
flights.description: An inventor comes up with a time machine, but must prevent its abuse at the hands of an evil C.E.O.

flights.title: Australia
flights.description: A young man meets a farm girl who is actually a witch.

flights.title: South Africa
flights.description: The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.
